definition: to spruce up/to renovate/to tend (a garden)/to groom (one's hair)/to finish (a rough surface)/to trim (a lawn)/to touch up (a photo)
surname Xiu
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
exactly/in good order/whole/complete/entire/in order/orderly/to repair/to mend/to renovate/(coll.) to fix sb/to give sb a hard time/to mess with sb

sentences.english: Brad and I fixed our side of the house up.
sentences.chinese: 布萊德將我倆住的這邊修整了一番。

sentences.english: I went to barbershop and got a haircut specially.
sentences.chinese: 我特地到理髮店修整了髮型。

sentences.english: Off the plane you see waves are green and full of trimming the lawn.
sentences.chinese: 一下飛機，滿眼都是綠，到處是修整的草坪。

sentences.english: Robbing no old to dress his beauty new;
sentences.chinese: 不掠舊美爲他的新美修整。

sentences.english: Deciding to do some back-yard landscaping, my father-in-law went to the brickyard to buy quantity of brick.
sentences.chinese: 我岳父打算買些磚來修整一下後院，他到磚廠拉磚。

sentences.english: So a little more sanding and it's truing up nicely again.
sentences.chinese: 因此，多一點的砂和它的修整了很好的一次。

sentences.english: Her relatives brought whole house lawn mowing machine.
sentences.chinese: 她的親戚帶來了剪草機修整房前屋後的草坪。

sentences.english: This finishing operation is omitted on bodies receiving rubber diaphragms.
sentences.chinese: 這道修整工序省去了配置橡膠隔膜的閥體。

sentences.english: It is a network that adjusts the spec-trutn of electron signals.
sentences.chinese: 它是一種對電信號的頻譜進行修整的網絡。

sentences.english: Deciding to do some back-yard landscaping, my father-in-law went to the brickyard to buy quantity of brick.
sentences.chinese: 我的岳父打算買些磚來修整一下後院，他到磚廠拉磚。

sentences.english: There is the definition of the finishing hours for each kind of toy.
sentences.chinese: 這是對每種玩具的修整工時的定義。

sentences.english: I built this jig for dressing the wheel.
sentences.chinese: 我建立的這輪修整夾具。

sentences.english: The process of electronically enlarging an image on a computer monitor to facilitate electronic retouching .
sentences.chinese: 中義在電腦上以電子方式放大影像以做修整的動作。

sentences.english: It's a prose style with all the ineptitudes filed away.
sentences.chinese: 這是一篇將所有拙劣之處修整過的散文體。

sentences.english: The virgins are all trimming their wicks .
You may be carrying paint or fabric swatches, or furniture out the door to be refinished.
sentences.chinese: 可能你會把某些繪畫或紡織樣品拿出來進行再次修整。
